A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many plot holes... I wouldn't even know where to begin.\nI will say the First Order must be a very\, very dumb organization for someone not to think of just dropping out of lightspeed in front of the rebel ship they were chasing for the majority of the movie.\nWith all that amazing technology the bad guys have at their disposal\, I would that they had some smart people within their ranks.
